price: Ambaye nyuma yake ipo Jahannamu, na atanywishwa maji ya usaha.
arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسۡقَىٰ مِن مَّآءٖ صَدِيدٖ
footnotes: Kushindwa kwa hao madhaalimu kunatangulia hapa duniani, na baada yake Akhera ipo adhabu ya Jahannamu. Huko watanyweshwa maji yanayo kirihi kama usaha unao toka kwa watu wa Motoni!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: min warāihi jahannamu wayus'qā min māin ṣadīdin
translations: and he will be made to drink
